function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global pandemic","Impact":"Business closures and layoffs","Mitigation":"Effective public health policies, economic interventions","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, economic stimulus tools","People":"General public, service SMEs","Owner":"Governments, health authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffective economic interventions","Impact":"Widespread business closures and unemployment","Mitigation":"Targeted economic stimulus, support for small businesses","Technologies":"Economic relief programs, financial technology","People":"Small business owners, workers","Owner":"Governments, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffective public health policies","Impact":"Failure to control the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Education, enforcement of health regulations","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Governments, health authorities"}]}
